name: Starship Turret Operator Guy
description:
Intense arcade action awaits you in this retro inspired space defense game. Play as a low-level starship employee that has just been promoted to turret operator.

Defend against wave after wave of incoming hostile threats while upgrading your turret, unlocking expansions and competing against the best players around the world for the ultimate score!

Packed with upgrades, secrets, achievements and more, this retro inspired shoot ‘em up will keep you entertained until there’s no more space pirates in sight!

FEATURES:
• Endless Shooting Arcade Action
• 75+ Turret Upgrades and 4 Unique Expansion Turrets
• Special Items Pickups and Secret Shops
• Unlock Unique Game Modes
• Advanced Scoring System that will keep skilled shooter fans engaged!
• Game Center Achievements and Leaderboard!
• Beautiful HD graphics and more!
